answers.answer: Aww hun everything will be okay just start eating healthy always think of your baby. Everytime i go to a restaurant i want to order everything "yummy" it all looks delicious lol. When i used to work at a restaurant ill eat burgers almost everyday. So just limit all the greasy food and ect so your health can be good.

I.was.just told Tuesday I have it too and met with my diabetes specialist. The eating healthy is not hard it's the taking your blood. But after a day in a half of doing it im fine with it. I actually failed bc I wasn't eating enough and when u don't eat your body produces sugar to survive.

I go for my glucose test tomorrow. I'm hoping I'm OK. I really will not look forward to cutting out all the soda lol yea I drink caffeine free. But I love soda now. I liked it before I got pregnant bit I love it now lol
Thanks for the advice :) I am going to the doctors on Friday &talk about me being diabetic. I just want my baby to be fine,&I'll do anything. I have so many questions about it though.

question: So I had the glucose tolerance test,&they called me today with my results telling me I'm diabetic :( This really *****, I know I will have to eat more healthy and exercise but working at a fast food restaurant won't help,everything looks so good to me.I just don't want nothing bad to happen to my baby so I'll do anything.
title: this *****
